title: What are some crazy examples of a sixth sense? - Quora

response.answer_text: While I'm not a ‘psychic’ or anything like that, I do have some unexplained moments where I ‘feel’ or sense things. It's not something I try to do nor can I control it or predict when it will happen, it's just a random but interesting coincidence. Of course like a lot of parents, I can sense when a child is doing something mischievous by the sheer loudness of the silence in the house… Or ‘feel’ them lurking motionless around a corner ready to leap out and shout Boo! .. I have an 80% score of turning this back on my 15yo son and scaring the beejebus out of him instead ;p this isn't really a sixth sense just parental awareness. I always sense when my older daughter is about to visit and will say ‘Sissy will be here soon’ usually 2–5 mins before she arrives. Her visits are random and I can't hear her car or anything. No idea how to explain that. I am constantly finding I will txt my kids that have moved out of home at the exact minute a txt then comes from them - after I've started typing . Possibly explainable by subtle frequency from a mobile signal but not until they have pressed send I’d have thought? I randomly get people a drink or pass them a pen or something and they reply ‘How did you know I wanted that?’. Not even when it would be expected they would feel thirsty such as after hard work, or when they are doing an activity that requires a pen etc. I was talking to a stranger online and, so weirdly and, ramdomly got a strong feeling they were north-east of me at the time, but they said they lived south. After 3 msgs from them. Turns out they were. Seems such a small silly thing but these types of things happen a lot and it's just super interesting to me and I am curious as to How it happens. I'd love to hears others who experience this and any theories or explanations on how or why or if it's just pure coincidence!
